Title: Hunting Tactics: Companion
Description: Your renown with the Maruuk grows. You may now hunt alongside a tenacious bakar or swift ohuna companion.
ObjectivesText: Choose to fight alongside a bakar or ohuna during the Grand Hunt.
RewardText:
Treat your hunting companion with loyalty and respect and they will protect your life with their own.

Return when your renown grows and I will train you further.
